Summary: small orb flying 100-200 yards in front of jet northbound- clear skies, no other northbound air traffic at that time.
divs: sighting detailsi was heading north on aurora (99) and noticed a light in front of a jet (white- perhaps alaska air). at that original distance the jet appearred about an inch long, the light maybe a sixteenth of an inch diameter (measured at arms length holding my fingers apart).the object brightly reflected sunlight from behind me for a moment then appearred a matte metallic color. it appearred to maintain a distance of 1 1\2 jet lengths in front until i found a spot to pull over to call my girlfriend to tell her. this occurred at10:02-10:04am. there was no northbound air traffic in the area for at least 5 min. after.the jet was just west of hywy 99 and first spotted just north of n 85th. at first i thought perhaps it was a fighter escort or a film crew jet (you never know) but the characteristics were way different from those. luckily i was on a 4 lane road with no other cars around so i could slow way down to safely look as long as i could. i also took off my sunglasses and put my head out the window to eliminate the possibility of it being a reflection. i lost sight of the object as the plane got further north and more distant and i had to pull over to be a safe driver as an intersection was ahead. i originally took notice of the jet because there was a distinct lack of air traffic at that time,just looked up and saw something odd out in front of it.
trends: There have been 110 other sightings in Seattle
There were no other sightings in Seattle on or around November 30th 2002
